line_1: (For he was bred with ev'ry courteous thew)
line_2: "The blatant-beast you thro' the lond pursue;

line_1: (For he was bred with ev'ry courteous thew)
line_2: "The fate of empires now demands my view,

line_1: (For he was bred with ev'ry courteous thew)
line_2: "Soon in this cell I'll thee again salew,
